body:
Supersedes #9845
Fixes #12945

This PR fixes the `verify_executables` check in the `spack.compiler` module, moves it to the `Compiler` class, and changes when it is called from instantiation time (we check every compiler) to build time (we check only the compiler we are using, who cares if the other compiler executables exist.
title: build_environment: verify compiler executables exist are are accessible
